name: Rocket Cat
description: Rocket Cat is an oscilloscope themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its vibrant red color (rossoCorsa), it stands out among the rest. Its body is adorned with a playful cat-shaped screen and its arms and legs are designed to resemble rockets, giving it a unique and powerful appearance. To top it off, Rocket Cat wears stylish glasses, adding a touch of sophistication to its overall look.
